page.title: 06QUALITY OF ENVIROMENT.
page.content: A-19th century terraced housing. Stannington Road. B-1930's semi-detached,Wood Lane. C-1960's semi & detached,Marchwood Rd. D-1960's high rise council flats,Liberty Hill. The quality of the enviroment is the appearance of the area around the housing.3=good,2=fair,1=poor,0=if a provision is not there. A B C D Outward appearance of house.3 2 3 1 Garage provision. 1 3 3 0 Garden provision. 2 3 3 0 Privacy for each family. 2 2 2 1 Freedom from traffic. 1 2 3 3 Freedom from noise. 1 2 3 2 Freedom from factories. 3 3 3 3 Freedom from litter. . 2 3 3 2 Playing areas for children. 1 2 3 1 Provision of open space. 2 3 3 3 Provision of churches. 1 1 1 1
